class.name: Game
class.brief_description: Class which contains the logic and data required to run a game. Does not contain any rendering functions or input processing.

method.name: end_turn
method.description: Goes to the next player's turn

method.name: move_troop
method.description: Moves a troop from one position to another. WARNING: If the move is invalid, then this function will throw an error.

method.name: place_card
method.description: Takes a card as input, and places that card at position x, y.

members.member: Contains the game's data. Saving the board to disk allows saving and loading games.

signal.name: terrain_updated
signal.description: Notifies other nodes when a set of terrain tiles is changed.

signal.name: troop_placed
signal.description: Emitted when a troop is placed.

signal.name: turn_ended
signal.description: Emitted when a player ends their turn.
